content: < 20 - 23 > 1 more time 2 times in total row 28 rs remove all markers while working as follows k2 ssk k until 4 sts before the end of row k2tog k2 now you will work i-cord edges on the both sides and outer edge then cords and inner neckline edge agata wilk @sznurkami cutie collar without breaking the yarn pick up 25 sts along the side of collar 1 st in each row skip the first and the last row break the yarn now pick up 25 sts along the other side of collar starting from the neckline to an edge picture 1 1 st in each row skip the first and the last row break the yarn slip 25 picked up sts from right needle to the left one now you can start to work i-cord from left shoulder cast on 2 sts on the left needle and work as follows *k1 k2tog tbl slip 2 sts back to the left needle* until last 2 sts bind off remaining sts break the yarn pick up sts along inner neckline as follows 4 sts in every 5 row it s approximately 80 sts break the yarn picture 1 now you will work the cord and then connect it to the inner edge to continue with i-cord edge using 3 5 mm picture 2 needles cast on 3 sts and work as follows *k2 k1 tbl slip back all sts to the left needle* until cord is approximately 30 cm long do not break the yarn move 3 sts on the left needle 4 mm next to previously picked up stitches picture 2 to continue i-cord edge along the neckline work as follows k1 k3tog tbl slip 2 sts back to the left needle *k1 k2tog tbl slip 2 sts back to the left needle* until you work all sts along the neckline and have 3 sts on the needle change the needle to 3 5 mm continue working the cord for approx 30 cm *k2 k1 tbl slip 3 sts back to the left needle* once the cord is 30 cm long bind off the remaining 3 sts weave in all ends in wash and block your collar and make sure to shape it properly your cutie collar is ready to wear i would be delighted if you could share your collar with me please use #cutiecollar or tag me @sznurkami on instagram agata wilk @sznurkami
